bug.author: apeforest
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>Description</denchmark-h>
The following link is missing: <denchmark-link:https://mxnet.apache.org/api/python/docs/api/tutorials/packages/gluon/index.html>https://mxnet.apache.org/api/python/docs/api/tutorials/packages/gluon/index.html</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h2>To Reproduce</denchmark-h>
From this page (<denchmark-link:https://mxnet.apache.org/api/python/docs/api/gluon/index.html>https://mxnet.apache.org/api/python/docs/api/gluon/index.html</denchmark-link> ), if user clicks the Gluon Guide box, it went to the above missing page.

comments.comment: I will work on this issue
